8 #ifndef FOGO_LINK_H_
9 #define FOGO_LINK_H_
10 
11 #include <hwpl/types.h>
12 
13 #ifdef __cplusplus
14 extern "C" {
15 #endif
16 
17 typedef uint32_t flink_device_t;
18 
19 
20 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
21  uint32_t loc;
22 } flink_read_t;
23 
24 typedef flink_read_t flink_write_t;
25 
26 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
27  uint32_t req;
28  uint32_t arg;
29 } flink_ioctl_t;
30 
31 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
32  uint8_t start;
33  uint8_t size;
34  uint8_t checksum;
35  uint8_t version;
36  uint8_t cmd;
37  flink_device_t d;
38  union {
39  flink_read_t read;
40  flink_write_t write;
41  flink_ioctl_t ioctl;
42  };
43 } flink_packet_t;
44 
45 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
46  int32_t ret;
47  int32_t err;
48 } flink_reply_t;
49 
50 
51 enum {
52  DEVICE_ADC,
53  DEVICE_I2C,
54  DEVICE_PIO0,
55  DEVICE_PIO1,
56  DEVICE_PIO2,
57  DEVICE_PIO3,
58  DEVICE_SPI,
59  DEVICE_SYS,
60  DEVICE_TOTAL
61 };
62 
63 enum {
64  CMD_NONE,
65  CMD_READSERIALNO,
66  CMD_IOCTL,
67  CMD_READ,
68  CMD_WRITE,
69  CMD_OPEN,
70  CMD_CLOSE,
71  CMD_TOTAL,
72  CMD_START = 0xAA
73 };
74 
75 #ifdef __cplusplus
76 }
77 #endif

79 #endif /* FOGO_LINK_H_ */
